Source.Name: pciutils
Source.Summary: Utilities to deal with PCI bus
Source.Description: The PCI Utilities are a collection of programs for inspecting and manipulating configuration of PCI devices, all based on a common portable library libpci which offers access to the PCI configuration space on a variety of operating systems.
